comment: I bought a bar of chocolate that day. It was the most difficult and most depressing feeling of getting a bar of chocolate. The journey was tough, pulling the trigger was tough. I wonder... how long can we go on? How long can I go on?

comment: I honestly don't know how long we can go on. The world is slowly opening up. Though cases are on the rise in some countries plus the variants, from the outside looking in, they seem to have hope whereas we are just holding on for dear life.

comment: The shops were empty. It was as though I was in a ghost town. There were people but you can feel the aura... like a heavy burden on everyone's shoulders. I was standing outside the stores, trying not to break down. was tough but I feel the endurance is slowly fading away.
